name: The B Side
description:
The B Side is a 2D action shooter game encapsulating the vibe of vinyl in fast paced double sided action. Flip the record to change your playing field in order to slay monsters and protect the nightclub. With three levels of increasing difficulty, this game is sure to be a challenge.

Created with GiltterDemon256 in one week for the Content Creators Community Jam 2020.

All assets are made by us
